Name: Typhlo-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cyndaquil, Quilava, and Typhlosion.  Swap a Typhlo-Gasp and a Typhlo-Fang for a Typhlo-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
